Description:
Prime Location (792m2 Allotment)
In the heart of this expanding suburb is a rare jewel in the crown, located only minutes from Epping Plaza, Northern Hospital, Epping Train Station, numerous primary and secondary schools & a host of other facilities.
Comprising 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, double garage, formal lounge, nicely landscaped gardens & a generous size parcel of land totalling 792m2.
Offers scope for renovating, extending or developing (STCA). Located In a highly desirable pocket of Epping, this home will be one to treasure for years to come.
Insights: 25 Young Street, Epping VIC 3076 was last sold in 2017 and 99 other 4 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
Dual Occupancy Potential! 649sqm!
Opportunity for the home buyer, investor or developer to purchase this 3 bedroom brick veneer home on a huge block 649sqm approximately STCA.
• Double secured carport with remote
• Huge 8x6m workshop
• Wood heater, evaporative cooling, alarm and more
• Within 1.5km of Westfield Shopping Centre

Description:
A Timeless Family Classic
Tucked away in a quiet court location is this immaculately presented 4 Bedroom Family Home, just moments to the popular Epping Plaza Shopping Centre, Northern Hospital and Primary School sitting on a sizeable 674 sqm (approx.) allotment that will entice a variety of eager buyers or family.
Comprising of four bedrooms, Ensuite with WIR, Huge lounge and Separate dining plus kitchen family area.
Additional features include garage, Heating and Cooling, Ceiling Fan.

Description:
AFFORDABLE, ADORABLE & AVAILABLE
Located walking distance to schools, bus and all the facilities this growth area has to offer. With the urban sprawl pushing further and further out, these established areas of Epping are making more and more sense. This great sized family home has it all. Renovated kitchen, modern appliances, main bedroom with ensuite and W.I.R., good size lounge, separate bright kitchen meals, ducted heating/ split system cooling and an undercover entertaining area to be proud of. It has potential written all over this one. It won't last. Call today.
Insights: 152 other 3 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
Explore your Empire
Located in the heart of Epping, like a star in the north, Empire Epping will rise above the rest offering unsurpassed premium real estate opportunities with apartments offering 1, 2 & 3 bedroom configurations with quality fixtures and fittings, garage allocation, inhouse gym and wellness centre, cafes, restaurants and supermarket.
Just minutes from the door of EMPIRE EPPING you'll find a world of facilities and amenities — everything you and your family need to live, learn and work. Less than 2km away is Pacific Epping, one of the region's largest shopping precincts, boasting 230-plus stores, three major supermarkets, fresh food precinct, bars, cafes and restaurants and more.
Setting a new standard in high-end integrated living, EMPIRE EPPING offers a complete lifestyle package in one of Melbourne's most affordable up-and-coming areas. Whether you're looking to set your family up in style, downsize for luxury and convenience, or invest in a hot growth region, claim your place in EMPIRE EPPING - A World Within.
This document has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is
correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies.
Accordingly all interested parties should make their own enquiries to verify the information.
http://rata.harcourts.com.au/Home/statement-of-information
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.

Description:
Family-sized value!
Imposingly spread over two stunning levels, enjoy plenty of sun-filled space in this 4 bedroom family townhouse located in the celebrated Aurora Estate.
Discover a high-end, stone-topped Smeg kitchen, light and bright open-plan living and dining, and a north-facing deck and landscaped courtyard for entertaining.
Head upstairs to access all bedrooms serviced by a pair of luxurious bathrooms, the main with bath. Includes separate laundry and a double automatic garage.
• 4 large bedrooms, main with WIR and stunning en suite featuring twin vanity and oversized shower, 3 with mirrored BIR
• Separate WCs on both floors
• Room for a home office on the landing upstairs
• Ducted heating, split-system heating and cooling
• Double remote-controlled garage featuring internal and external access
Take advantage of local schools, shopping, transport and lush parkland all nearby. When the day is done, this is truly living!
For more information, please contact Alex Melnychuk today.

Description:
Explore your Empire
Located in the heart of Epping, like a star in the north, Empire Epping will rise above the rest offering unsurpassed premium real estate opportunities with apartments offering 1, 2 & 3 bedroom configurations with quality fixtures and fittings, garage allocation, inhouse gym and wellness centre, cafes, restaurants and supermarket.
Just minutes from the door of EMPIRE EPPING you'll find a world of facilities and amenities — everything you and your family need to live, learn and work. Less than 2km away is Pacific Epping, one of the region's largest shopping precincts, boasting 230-plus stores, three major supermarkets, fresh food precinct, bars, cafes and restaurants and more.
Setting a new standard in high-end integrated living, EMPIRE EPPING offers a complete lifestyle package in one of Melbourne's most affordable up-and-coming areas. Whether you're looking to set your family up in style, downsize for luxury and convenience, or invest in a hot growth region, claim your place in EMPIRE EPPING - A World Within.

Description:
Beautifully presented, perfectly located.
For the first time on offer this immaculately presented family home in one of Epping's most sought after pockets presents a great opportunity for all home buyers. Set on a 568sqm block this family home provides an abundance of space, quality fittings and plenty of natural light. As you enter you will instantly feel the warmth of a great family home, a home that has been kept with the highest of pride. This property offers four spacious bedrooms including master with walk in robe and renovated ensuite, central bathroom, formal lounge and dining and a renovated kitchen with s/s appliances and adjoining meals area opening up to the second living zone. With seamless transition from inside to out enjoy an alfresco area like you have never seen before. This huge space includes a fully covered entertainment zone perfect for all year round family fun, plus drive through garage access to a workshop with space
for up to 4 cars and ample storage leading out to the rear low maintenance yard.
Additional Features include ducted heating, air-conditioning, down lights, alarm, side access, remote garage, security shutters, quality window furnishings, work shop and shed, court location and laundry with external access. Close to shops, public transport and in numerous school zones, this property is a must see, don't be the one to miss out on this great opportunity.

Description:
Family Living In Prime Location
This much-loved family gem will warm the heart with its light filled interior, pristine condition and generous accommodation, ideally suited to the growing family with room to breathe both inside and out.
Whether you're looking to invest or 1st time buyer, look no further than this well presented home comprising of 3 bedrooms with en-suite and walk in robe to master, central bathroom, formal L-shaped dining and living area, ample kitchen space with adjoining meals that overlooks to your private covered oasis complete with your very own bar.
All this set on a generous 540m2 approx allotment.
Other features include security roller shutters, heating and air conditioning throughout, garage with rear roller door, garden shed and manicured gardens.
Situated minutes from Epping Plaza, Westfield shopping, choice of Epping & South Morang train stations, buses, Meadow Glen primary, secondary schools, aged care, kindergartens, the list goes on...
Come in and inspect today!
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.
767 High Street Epping
219 High Street Thomastown
510 Plenty Road Mill Park
952-954 High Street Reservoir
http://rata.harcourts.com.au/Home/statement-of-information

Description:
THE PERFECT FIRST HOME OR INVESTMENT
As new immaculately presented home of 3 bedrooms (2 with BIRs and master with walk in robe and ensuite), central bathroom, lounge, kitchen meals with stone bench tops opening to outdoor undercover entertaining area, garden shed and garage with internal access.
Features include carpets to all bedrooms, heating/cooling and dishwasher.
Separate title with no Owners Corp/Body Corporate
Move straight in not a cent to spend!

Description:
Explore your Empire
Located in the heart of Epping, like a star in the north, Empire Epping will rise above the rest offering unsurpassed premium real estate opportunities with apartments offering 1, 2 & 3 bedroom configurations with quality fixtures and fittings, garage allocation, inhouse gym and wellness centre, cafes, restaurants and supermarket.
Just minutes from the door of EMPIRE EPPING you'll find a world of facilities and amenities — everything you and your family need to live, learn and work. Less than 2km away is Pacific Epping, one of the region's largest shopping precincts, boasting 230-plus stores, three major supermarkets, fresh food precinct, bars, cafes and restaurants and more.
Setting a new standard in high-end integrated living, EMPIRE EPPING offers a complete lifestyle package in one of Melbourne's most affordable up-and-coming areas. Whether you're looking to set your family up in style, downsize for luxury and convenience, or invest in a hot growth region, claim your place in EMPIRE EPPING - A World Within.
This document has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is
correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies.
Accordingly all interested parties should make their own enquiries to verify the information.
http://rata.harcourts.com.au/Home/statement-of-information
